Text:
SMOKE A FATTY... We got new Drake for ya all... I hope you all like... Drake won 
two awards last night during the MuchMusic Video Awards in his hometown of Toronto, Canada
Drake was nominated for a total of seven awards, took home two last night, one for Hip-Hop 
Video of the Year and another for Cinematography of the Year...
